hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas that a woman offered herself in marriage to the Prophet. The daughter of Anas laughed and said:"How little was her modesty." Anas said: "She was better than you; she offered herself in marriage to the Prophet

chapter.ara-name: باب عَرْضِ الْمَرْأَةِ نَفْسَهَا عَلَى مَنْ تَرْضَى .
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Offering Herself In Marriage To One Whom She Likes
